item.title: Hero Update 1
item.description: From the hero union, here is the latest news. There is a bank robbery in progress at the corner of ferst and hemphill. Be sure to bring your yeezys, gun and whip the rari. Good luck Mr. Incredible!

item.title: Hero Update2
item.description: From the hero union, here is the latest news. There is a murder in progress at the corner of west ave and north ave. Be sure to bring your blanket, shield and whip the jag. Good luck Mr. Incredible!

item.title: Hero Update 3
item.description: From the hero union, here is the latest news. There is a homocide in progress at the corner of main and keep. Be sure to bring your flip phone, love and whip the lambo. Good luck Mr. Incredible!

item.title: Hero Update 4
item.description: From the hero union, here is the latest news. There is a shootout in progress at the corner of north peactree and morganton. Be sure to bring your pillow, iron man suit and whip the bugatti. Good luck Mr. Incredible!

item.title: Hero Update 5
item.description: From the hero union, here is the latest news. There is a hijacking in progress at the corner of gates and terrace. Be sure to bring your tights, mydaq and whip the odyssey. Good luck Mr. Incredible!
